channel.title: Need help with FL6
channel.description:
Hey,
I used to fuck around with FL5. Not really doing anything. Now im getting serious and Ive gotten 6.0.
But all I can make is patterns and yes thats fine. But then I go to the playlist and try to put them together and stuff and it will not save it or play it. I dunno, I tried help, and it sucked. I'm a total noob at this, but I would like to learn and I need some help since I'm just starting out.
Thanks

item.title: Need help with FL6
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

Thank you so much, It was only one thing I was doing wrong. Thanks

Rep++
